analyzed: tasmā rakkhita cittassa sammā saṅkappa gocaraḥ ti gāthā

original: Samathavipassanāya bhāvitāya nirodho phalaṁ, pariññātaṁ dukkhaṁ, samudayo pahīno, maggo bhāvito paṭipakkhena.
analyzed: samatha vipassanāya bhāvitāya nirodhaḥ phala pariññātam dukkha samudayaḥ pahīnaḥ maggaḥ bhāvito paṭipakkhena
